name: Separated (Cold Winter Cabin)
description:
Made for the 2023 GDevelop game jam.

This game is about helping a girl get home and the challenges that come with the task. This was my first game jam. I am surprised that I was able to even finish. Hope you enjoy the game.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Continue Conversation / Skill Check

WASD or Left, Right,Up Down Arrow Keys - Movement
